testcase.name: Search for job vacancies as a Guest

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given open the url "https://www.amazon.com/" in the browser.................undefined When click on "Careers" link under "Get to Know Us" in the bottom section of the page..undefined Then Find jobs page should open.............................................undefined When user clicks on the search icon.........................................undefined Then Your job application page should open..................................undefined When enter the "Angular Developer" title and select appropriate job.........undefined And enter the "India" and select approproate location.......................undefined And click the search icon...................................................undefined Then a list of related job results should be displayed......................undefined
